thread.section_title: The Union Democrat, Sonora, CA News, Sports, & Weather
thread.title: Roadwork for Oct. 3, 2015

title: Roadwork for Oct. 3, 2015
text: Roadwork for Oct. 3, 2015 Roadwork for Oct. 3, 2015 By Union Democrat staff October 03, 2015 01:00 am Tuolumne County HIGHWAY 49 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. Sunday through Friday from Montezuma Road Railroad to Chicken Ranch Road for paving. Expect 10-minute delays. HIGHWAY 49 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m. Monday through Friday from Shaws Flat Road to Poppy Hills Drive for drainage work. Expect 10-minute delays. HIGHWAY 49 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. Sunday through Friday from Highway 120 near Chinese Camp to Montezuma Road Railroad for paving. Expect 10-minute delays. HIGHWAY 108 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 8 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. Monday through Friday from Pinecrest Dump Road to Beardsley Reservoir Road for drainage cleaning. Expect five-minute delays. HIGHWAY 120 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 7 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. Monday through Friday from Pine Tree Point to Ferndale Road for slope repair and clearing. Expect five-minute delays. HIGHWAY 120 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 8 a.m. to 2 p.m. Monday through Friday from Yosemite Lakes Drive to the west boundary of Yosemite National Park for curb, gutter and sidewalk work. Expect five-minute delays. Calaveras County HIGHWAY 12 — Shoulder work will be in effect all day today through Friday from Pine Street to Cosgrove Creek for highway construction. HIGHWAY 26 — Lane work will be in effect all day today through Friday from Nove Way to Highway 12 for highway construction. HIGHWAY 26 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. Monday through Friday from Happy Valley Road to Lower Dorray Road for slope repair and clearing. Expect 10-minute delays. HIGHWAY 26 — One-way traffic control will be in effect from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. Sunday through Saturday from Happy Valley Road to Lower Dorray Road for tree work. Expect five-minute delays. Follow UnionDemocrat.com
